tasks.task: Create a simple wireframe for a login form using the 8-point grid system, focusing on clear typography and sufficient padding.
Write a short reflection (1 page) on how you would handle a situation where a user is frustrated with the navigation of your current portfolio website.
Research and list 3 common design patterns used in login forms, along with their benefits and drawbacks.
Create a high-fidelity wireframe for the login form, incorporating feedback from your reflection task.
Conduct a usability test on your portfolio website with 2 participants, documenting 3 pain points and suggesting potential solutions.
Research the concept of 'Micro-Interactions' in UX design, including examples and best practices.
Design a visual system for the login form, including typography, color palette, and iconography.
Create a user story map for your portfolio website, identifying key user journeys and pain points.
Research the concept of 'Emotional Design' in UX, including examples and best practices.
Create a comprehensive design system for your portfolio website, including guidelines and assets.
Develop a presentation to showcase your design process and user research findings to a potential client or team.
Create a case study on a successful UX design project, including lessons learned and best practices.

resources.readup: As a UX practitioner, you have the power to shape the user experience and create products that truly meet people's needs. By focusing on your strengths - such as product thinking and strategy - and working on areas like user research and validation, collaboration, and communication, you can take your skills from 67/100 to 90/100 and become a leading UX designer.

resources.title: 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design
resources.description: 7 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design ================================================= Jakob Nielsen ![](https://media.nngroup.com/medi...

topics.name: Mastering Usability Heuristics
topics.summary: Applying usability heuristics effectively will significantly improve the user experience and design decisions.
practice_points: Create a comprehensive usability heuristic checklist with clear definitions and examples for each principle (Deliverable: 1-page PDF)
Analyze 3 existing products using the 10 Usability Heuristics for User Interface Design resource and provide actionable recommendations for improvement
Design 2 new product features that incorporate at least 5 usability heuristics, including wireframes and a written justification

topics.name: Understanding Visual Hierarchy and Aesthetic-Usability Effect
topics.summary: Developing an understanding of visual hierarchy and the aesthetic-usability effect will enhance your design decisions.
practice_points: Create a visual hierarchy exercise using 5 different layouts, with clear explanations for each choice (Deliverable: 1-page report)
Design 2 wireframes that incorporate the Aesthetic-Usability Effect, including color schemes and typography
Conduct an analysis of 3 existing websites' use of visual hierarchy and provide suggestions for improvement

topics.name: Improving Collaboration and Communication through Storytelling
topics.summary: Developing effective storytelling skills will enhance your collaboration and communication with stakeholders.
practice_points: Create a 3-minute presentation on the importance of storytelling in UX design, using visual aids (Deliverable: Video recording)
Conduct 2 interviews with team members or stakeholders to understand their needs and preferences for UX documentation
Write a clear and concise UX report that incorporates storytelling techniques, including a summary of findings and recommendations
